description: The Sennheiser's MM 70s is a universal mobile music and communication headset that delivers lifelike sound quality while listening to music or taking calls. This dynamic in ear speaker system uses neodymium magnets providing dynamic sound with a smooth frequency response. Different sizeed ear canal tips allow for an individual ear canal fit to optimize performance and improve noise isolation. The in-line remote with integrated microphone makes it easy to manage phone calls, volume and music tracks with virtually all Smartphone brands featuring a 3.5mm headphone jack - making the MM 70s the perfect choice regardless of the device you use. This headphone's combination of features and audio performance make it an exceptional value.
title: Sennheiser MM 70 S Ear Canal Headset for Smartphones, Black
